    • Constructor Detail

      • HelicorderData

        public HelicorderData()
        Generic empty constructor.

      • HelicorderData

        public HelicorderData(ByteBuffer bb)
        Create a helicorder from a byte buffer. This first 4 bytes specify an integer number of rows followed by rows*24 bytes, 3 doubles: j2ksec, min, max.
        Parameters:
        bb - the byte buffer

      • HelicorderData

        public HelicorderData(List<double[]> list)
        Creates a helicorder from a double[] (j2ksec, min, max) list.
        Parameters:
        list - the list of values
